trackDAOProperties.delete: DELETE FROM track WHERE name = ? AND author = ? AND album = ? AND duration = ? AND genre_id = ?
trackDAOProperties.update: UPDATE track SET name = ?, author = ?, album = ?, duration = ?, genre_id = ? WHERE name = ? AND author = ? AND album = ? AND duration = ? AND genre_id = ?

genreDAOProperties.update: UPDATE genre SET name = ? WHERE name = ?
